description: Manual data corrections for missing or incorrect SFMTA data. These overrides are applied during ingestion to augment the official datasets.
notes: Pattern identified: Some CNNs have street cleaning data for only L or R side, missing the opposite side
19th St has same CNN for both L (2701-2799) and R (2700-2798) sides
When one side has data but opposite is missing, it likely needs manual verification

overrides.reason: Missing from SFMTA street cleaning schedules dataset - physically verified on-site. CNN has L side data but R side is missing.
overrides.notes: This CNN also serves 19th St L 2701-2799 which has street cleaning data. R side was missing and manually verified.
